name: Boon of Beetles
text: [x]When you have space during combat, summon a 3/3 Beetle with Taunt. (4 left!)

name: Beetle
text: Taunt

name: Corrupted Cupcakes
text:
[x]Choose a friendly
Demon. It consumes
all minions in the Tavern
to gain their stats.

name: Suspicious Stimulant
text: Choose a minion in the Tavern. Lock it in your hand for 1 turn and double its stats.
